projectDescriptor.description: N4JS project for demonstrating the main capabilities of the language through a simple example. After creating the project third-party npm dependencies used by this example should be installed automatically.
projectDescriptor.name: n4js-tasks-example

wizard.name: N4JS Tasks Example
wizard.description: N4JS Tasks Example. Creates projects to demonstrate the main capabilities of the N4JS language.

command.label: Consider Overriden Members
command.tooltip: If checked, references to the overriden members in superclasses and implemented interfaces are also considered when finding references.

command.label: Ignore Named Import Specifier
command.tooltip: If checked, references to named import specifier are not shown in the find references result.
